The Afflicted are villagers of Mort'ton who were cursed by Lord Lowerniel Vergidiyad Drakan's evil gust of wind. They speak nonsense to the player if talked to.

Afflicted can be only cured temporarily by using either Serum 207 or Serum 208, despite the latter being a "permanent" cure, although this is for gameplay reasons.
